title: Chargeback documentation and dispute records
dataVerified: Merchant, customer, transaction details, chargeback reason, evidence
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Dispute status (open/resolved). Link to processor/bank system (parties and card networks, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents forged chargeback evidence. Domain binding verifies processor/bank. Tamper-evident dispute record. Merchant protection (fraudulent chargebacks). Card network compliance (Visa/MC dispute rules). Audit trail for appeals.
